I originally ordered this top because it was marketed as an alternative to the SKIMS tops from Kim Kardashian's brand, but frankly the quality of this top is better than the SKIMS tops I do own, which are thin and extremely see-through.  The fabric of this shirt is very soft and thick and fits well. I normally wear a size small and am a 32D and the small that I ordered fits perfectly! There is a good amount of stretch but it really forms to your body and disguises any lumps or bumps. It's also thick enough to be worn with or without a bra - without a bra it isn't see-through, but if you do wear a bra it doesn't show any bra lines!  I'm planning to order more of these tops in the future. They are such good quality, much better than the more expensive alternatives on the market. This is much better than a dupe of any of those brands! I highly recommend these shirts, they can be worn day-to-day and while going out!
I love these tops. I have almost every color and have been wearing them for over a year now. They’re perfect for both athletic outfits and also nice outfits. Very flattering.

评论概述: Comfortable, durable, looks exactly like picture
评论详情: I've had this shirt for about a year now, so it's been worn and washed a bunch of times. It's very soft (even after many washes) and comfortable. (For reference, my skin is very sensitive and I HATE itchy clothing. This is not itchy.) It is indeed tight. I'm 5'7" and 130lbs and I got a small, and it's pretty snug; I use it as a shell. (It looks exactly like it does in the pictures.) My only complaint would be that there's no tag, so for a while, every time I put the shirt on, I had a 50/50 chance of putting it on backwards. However, if you hold it up to see where the collar lines up, the back is higher than the front, so it just takes a bit of eyeballing. Overall, it's a really great shirt and I'd highly recommend.

Have 4 of these. Nice, slightly more dressy look instead of fitted tee shirt. Washes well and stretch allows for comfortable fit.  Fitted cut. Nice to find a fitted top that doesn’t show midriff but isn’t too long, either.
Best shirt ever I want it in every color. It’s perfect for any outfit and is a great staple piece
